definition: Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream
to drop/to fall/to come down/to descend
to surrender/to capitulate/to subdue/to tame

sentences.english: The first frost always meant that Papa was coming to see us.
sentences.chinese: 第一次霜降總是意味着爺爺來探望我們。

sentences.english: As Frost's Descent comes, the world is filled with the atmosphere of late autumn.
sentences.chinese: 伴隨着霜降的到臨，萬物充滿了晚秋的氣息。

sentences.english: We need to try to harvest the crops before the frost.
sentences.chinese: 我們得趕在霜降之前採收作物。

sentences.english: And the Shuangjiang on banks asset quality is also a major positive.
sentences.chinese: 而對銀行的資產質素霜降也是一個重要的積極的。

sentences.english: Every fall, when the frost first played freeze tag with the grass, Papa would come to our house.
sentences.chinese: 在每個秋天的第一次霜降，爺爺就會到我們家來。

sentences.english: As the frost is calling for young harvest to the night.
sentences.chinese: 而這霜降之夜預兆了的雛見的收穫。

sentences.english: Jack Frost was threatening to kill the new plants.
sentences.chinese: 霜降危及新作物的存活。

sentences.english: Today is in the Chinese 24 solar terms hoar frost descendings.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國二十四節氣中的霜降。

sentences.english: Early dews are on a lea with camomiles.
sentences.chinese: 早霜降在種著甘菊的牧場。

sentences.english: In the countryside, people believe that their lips will crack if they don't eat persimmons during this period.
sentences.chinese: 在農村，人們認爲霜降不喫柿子，嘴脣會乾裂。

sentences.english: Eating persimmons during Frost's Descent can help people resist the cold and protect their bones.
sentences.chinese: 霜降時期喫柿子能幫助人們抵禦寒冷，保護好骨骼。

sentences.english: Stars climb, frost comes, and blue jays sing.
sentences.chinese: 星星升起，霜降下來，藍松鴉歌唱。

definition: Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
solar term
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
midwinter/the depth of winter
season/time
late autumn
the cool of autumn
Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
